eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~14h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The issue is a missing USB-C cable, which is a product characteristic and not a material mismatch. No clear mismatch exists between the listing and delivered item.

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-12033
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The issue is a missing USB-C cable, which is a product characteristic and not a material mismatch. No clear mismatch exists between the listing and delivered item.
Decision: Neutral
Outcome: The dispute was settled with a partial refund of 300 TWD to the buyer.
